languages.text: "В Истине Изначальной отыщите вы силы и власть для воздаяния тем, кто держал вас в слепоте. Ей преисполнившись, воплотите волю истинных богов и сразите нечестивцев".

traits.locale_text: "В Исконной Истине отыщите вы силы и власть для воздаяния тем, кто держал вас в слепоте. Ей преисполнившись, воплотите волю истинных богов и сразите нечестивцев".

languages.text: "Find within the Primordial Truth the strength and power to deliver retribution unto those who kept you blind. Sated with its divinity, manifest the will of the true gods and strike down the unbelievers."
languages.original_text: "В Истине Изначальной отыщите вы силы и власть для воздаяния тем, кто держал вас в слепоте. Ей преисполнившись, воплотите волю истинных богов и сразите нечестивцев".

traits.locale_text: "Find within the Primordial Truth the strength and power to deliver retribution unto those who kept you blind. Once filled with the Truth, manifest the will of the true gods and strike down the profaners."

"Find within the Primordial Truth the strength and power to deliver retribution unto those who kept you blind. Once filled with the Truth, manifest the will of the true gods and strike down the profaners."

"Find within the Primordial Truth the strength and power to deliver retribution unto those who kept you blind. Sated with its divinity, manifest the will of the true gods and strike down the unbelievers."

"Find within the Primordial Truth the strength and power to deliver retribution unto those who kept you blind. Sated with its divinity, manifest the will of the true gods and strike down the unbelievers."

"Find within the Primordial Truth the strength and power to deliver retribution unto those who kept you blind. Sated with its divinity, manifest the will of the true gods and strike down the unbelievers."

"Find within the Primordial Truth the strength and power to deliver retribution unto those who kept you blind. Sated with its divinity, manifest the will of the true gods and strike down the unbelievers."

languages.text: “在原初真理中寻找力量与权能，让那些将你困在黑暗之中的人遭到报应。让它的神性满足你，成为真神意志的化身，消灭那些不信奉真理之人。”
languages.original_text: "Find within the Primordial Truth the strength and power to deliver retribution unto those who kept you blind. Sated with its divinity, manifest the will of the true gods and strike down the unbelievers."

traits.locale_text: “在原初真理中寻找力量与权能，让那些将你困在黑暗之中的人遭到报应。让它的神性满足你，成为真神意志的化身，消灭那些不信奉真理之人。”

languages.text: «Busca en la Verdad Primordial la fuerza y el poder necesarios para vengarte de quienes te han cegado. Sáciate con su divinidad, manifiesta la voluntad de los verdaderos dioses y abate a los infieles».
languages.original_text: "Find within the Primordial Truth the strength and power to deliver retribution unto those who kept you blind. Sated with its divinity, manifest the will of the true gods and strike down the unbelievers."

traits.locale_text: «Busca en la Verdad Primordial la fuerza y el poder necesarios para vengarte de quienes te han cegado. Sáciate con su divinidad, manifiesta la voluntad de los verdaderos dioses y abate a los infieles».

languages.text: 「原初の真実の中に、己の視野を奪う者達に罰を下す力と権力を見つけなさい。その神力で体を満たし、真の神の意思を具現化して、不信者を倒すのです」
languages.original_text: "Find within the Primordial Truth the strength and power to deliver retribution unto those who kept you blind. Sated with its divinity, manifest the will of the true gods and strike down the unbelievers."

traits.locale_text: 「原初の真実の中に、己の視野を奪う者達に罰を下す力と権力を見つけなさい。その神力で体を満たし、真の神の意思を具現化して、不信者を倒すのです」

languages.text: "Findet in der Primordialen Wahrheit Kraft und Stärke, um Vergeltung an jenen zu üben, die Euch blind gehalten haben. Seid erfüllt von ihrer Göttlichkeit, lasst den Willen der wahren Götter manifest werden, und streckt die Ungläubigen nieder."
languages.original_text: "Find within the Primordial Truth the strength and power to deliver retribution unto those who kept you blind. Sated with its divinity, manifest the will of the true gods and strike down the unbelievers."

traits.locale_text: "Findet in der Primordialen Wahrheit Kraft und Stärke, um Vergeltung an jenen zu üben, die Euch blind gehalten haben. Seid erfüllt von ihrer Göttlichkeit, lasst den Willen der wahren Götter manifest werden, und streckt die Ungläubigen nieder."

languages.text: « Puisez dans la Vérité Primordiale la force et la puissance de châtier ceux qui veulent vous maintenir dans l'ignorance. Forts de sa divinité, faites-vous les artisans de la volonté des vrais dieux et frappez impitoyablement les infidèles. »
languages.original_text: "Find within the Primordial Truth the strength and power to deliver retribution unto those who kept you blind. Sated with its divinity, manifest the will of the true gods and strike down the unbelievers."

traits.locale_text: « Puisez dans la Vérité Primordiale la force et la puissance de châtier ceux qui veulent vous maintenir dans l'ignorance. Forts de sa divinité, faites-vous les artisans de la volonté des vrais dieux et frappez impitoyablement les infidèles. »

languages.text: "Gözünü kör edenleri cezalandıracak gücü ve kuvveti Ezelî Hakikat'te bulasın. Hakikat'in ilahi kudretiyle, gerçek tanrıların emrinde kâfirlerin belasını veresin."
languages.original_text: "Find within the Primordial Truth the strength and power to deliver retribution unto those who kept you blind. Sated with its divinity, manifest the will of the true gods and strike down the unbelievers."

traits.locale_text: "Gözünü kör edenleri cezalandıracak gücü ve kuvveti Ezelî Hakikat'te bulasın. Hakikat'in ilahi kudretiyle, gerçek tanrıların emrinde kâfirlerin belasını veresin."
